attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: DDA (deaf peoples) who are unable get a jobs by their 40 yrs old or more ages.  Employment or companies both are ignore from deaf peoples or disable and they won't offer them jobs. I am keep go on looking a job again for 7 months but no heard from it because i was made redundancy for 16 yrs from work and so i was angry and very upset.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
